name: Dog house
description: The dog house is painted a classic red, with a wooden slab above the door bearing the name "Pupperoni".

name: Fire pit
description: The fire pit must have been recently used - there is a still a pile of ashes in the center.

name: Garden
description: The garden has flowers in every color imaginable, and almost as many butterflies fluttering around them.

name: Stove
description: The stove is spotless - either the person who cleaned it was very thorough, or else there is very little cooking that happens here.

name: Table
description: The circular table seats four people. The only thing on it is the white tablecloth.

name: Dishwasher
description: The dishwasher is still, but when you open it the inside is hot. A cycle must have just finished. There are a few dishes inside.

name: Trashcan
description: The trashcan is stuffed with junk food wrappers. A man after your own heart.

name: Couch
description: The brown leather couch is massive. You stick your hands between the cushions, but you find nothing but crumbs.

name: TV
description: The television is a 98‚Äù Class Samsung Neo QLED 8K QN990C. Mr. Cool must have enjoyed his entertainment. Or he had vision problems. Or both.

name: Christmas Tree
description: The Christmas Tree is fake, but you spot a few pine-scented air fresheners hidden amongst the ornaments.

name: Rug
description: Upon closer look, you realize that what you thought was a carpet is actual just a darker spot where the floor wasn't impacted by sunlight - the actual rug is missing, leaving behind a stark outline where it likely laid for years.

name: Desk
description: The desk is beige metal, the kind that your parents likely used in the 1970s. This is not where Mr. Cool invested his money - or his time.

name: Computer
description: The computer looks like it's still hanging on, but the white plastic frame is yellowing and some of the letters have been worn off of the keys on the keyboard.

name: Printer
description: There is newer printer sitting next to the computer on the desk. You doubt it works through - there is a large - fist sized dent on top.

name: Bookcase
description: The books on the bookshelf are mainly either history texts, manuals, or phonebooks. Strange guy.

name: Billiards table
description: This billiards table must have been well-loved - but not by anyone good at billiards. The felt lining is all scuffed up.

name: Dart board
description: There is a dart board, but not darts to be seen. You wonder if all the tiny holes on the wall around the boards has anything to do with that.

name: Arcade machines
description: Three arcade machines stand side-by-side: Pac-Man, Street Fighter, and Donkey Kong. You look at the high score for each of them, and the counters are all maxed out. Could it be that Mr. Cool was the best arcadist of all time?

name: Pen
description: A blue pen, a pen is a type of thing!

name: Glove
description: A bloody glove.

name: Receipt
description: The receipt is for the purchase of a signed baseball bat from some online store that sells collectables. Must have been signed by Babe Ruth himself at that price point.

name: Candy Wrapper
description: A Rooso's Peanut Butter Tree, the best part of the season. The wrapper still smells like chocolate and peanut butter.

name: Note #1
description: The letter B is written on the letter in red ink

name: Note #2
description: The letter U is written on the paper in red ink

name: Note #3
description: The letter T is written on the paper  in red ink

name: Note #4
description: The letter L is written on the paper in red ink

name: Note #5
description: The letters ER are written on the paper  in red ink

name: Crime Report
description:
The report reads: 
"The victim was punctured in the jugular with a small pointy object.
There are traces of ink on the victim's neck near the wound."
